name: false-swipe
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
short_effect: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.

flavor_text.black_white: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
